Hello Samsara!

Starting Friday July 9 @ 530 PM PST, we will be updating SFDC to accommodate our new renewal and add on process updates. This change will take until Sunday July 11 @ 11AM PSTDuring the above times, please do not create or modify any CPQ quotes.

Please submit a SalesOps ticket if you have any urgent deals that require immediate attention.
